data.text:
Since 2020

Due to the growing interest and the wide application of omics approaches, more than 100 papers on adhesion GPCRs are currently published every year. Showing all these papers here is time-consuming and not appropriate anymore.

The following terms allow an efficient search of the adhesion GPCR literature in PubMed: adhesion gpcr OR ADGRL1 OR ADGRL2 OR ADGRL3 OR ADGRL4 OR ADGRE1 OR ADGRE2 OR ADGRE3 OR ADGRE4 OR ADGRE5 OR ADGRA1 OR ADGRA2 OR ADGRA3 OR ADGRC1 OR ADGRC2 OR ADGRC3 OR ADGRD1 OR ADGRD2 OR ADGRF1 OR ADGRF2 OR ADGRF3 OR ADGRF4 OR ADGRF5 OR ADGRB1 OR ADGRB2 OR ADGRB3 OR ADGRG1 OR ADGRG2 OR ADGRG3 OR ADGRG4 OR ADGRG5 OR ADGRG6 OR ADGRG7 OR ADGRV1 OR LPHN1 OR LPHN2 OR LPHN3 OR ELTD1 OR EMR1 OR EMR2 OR EMR3 OR EMR4 OR CD97 OR GPR123 OR GPR124 OR GPR125 OR CELSR1 OR CELSR2 OR CELSR3 OR GPR133 OR GPR144 OR GPR110 OR GPR111 OR GPR113 OR GPR115 OR GPR116 OR BAI1 OR BAI2 OR BAI3 OR GPR56 OR GPR64 OR GPR97 OR GPR112 OR GPR114 OR GPR126 OR GPR128 OR GPR98 OR latrophilin
